title: BRIEF-India's Alkem Labs St. Louis Plant Gets FDA Form 483 With 4 Observations
text:
BRIEF-India's Alkem Labs St. Louis Plant Gets FDA Form 483 With 4 Observations

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 11, 2019 18:51)

© Reuters. BRIEF-India's Alkem Labs St. Louis Plant Gets FDA Form 483 With 4 Observations Sept 11 (Reuters) - Alkem Laboratories Ltd : * INDIA'S ALKEM LABS SAYS US FDA HAS ISSUED AN ESTABLISHMENT INSPECTION REPORT FOR COMPANY'S MANUFACTURING FACILITY LOCATED AT ST. LOUIS * SAYS RECEIVED A FORM 483 ISSUED BY US FDA CONTAINING FOUR OBSERVATIONS * SAYS INSPECTION HAS NOW BEEN CLOSED BY US FDA

BRIEF-India's Alkem Labs St. Louis Plant Gets FDA Form 483 With 4 Observations
description: BRIEF-India's Alkem Labs St. Louis Plant Gets FDA Form 483 With 4 Observations
